venue.address_2: ( 1 block from Kenmore Square toward Brookline)
venue.name: RISQUE at An Tua Nua

item.description:
Let's keep 2013 rolling!! Thanks for the great turn out last month! We are back at Risque March 6th for their special 3rd ANNIVERSARY PARTY!!! It will be a SPECIAL NIGHT with a LIVE BAND!!

We will meet in the bar area of An Tua Nua at 8:00pm to chat, greet, mingle before the night starts :)

At 8:30pm we will move to the back room (Risque) where the dance floor is and the salsa/bachata lesson will begin. Lesson goes until 10:00pm then social dancing begins! Dancing continues to about 1:00am. Because of the live band the lesson and dancing will be $20 and Social Dancing only after 10:00pm is $15

We have a reserved table at the end of the bar out back so if you want to arrive later I will be there.

Please do not hesitate to send me your questions/comments/concerns. I am happy to answer all matter of meetup or salsa related questions and if I can't I will find someone who can.

Look forward to meeting all of you! Let's keep the salsa party going.

-Marley
item.how_to_find_us: Green line to Kenmore (B,C,D) or St. Mary's Street (C line). Plenty of street parking.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Risque Salsa and Bachata Meetup: 3rd ANNIVERSARY PARTY!!!
